group_1.textLeft: Um... I was just wondering...
When someone's kind to you, it's natural to thank@them, right?

group_1.textRight: Are you telling Alina that that's not good enough?

group_1.textLeft: No, I mean... Isn't there anything else you can think of...?

group_1.textRight: Noisy Poor Art.

group_1.textLeft: ......[wait:0.8][chara:305700:lipSynch_1] Karin-...
I really love Karin's cheerfulness...!

group_1.textRight: More importantly...
I really want you to figure out another way to@drag the idiota out.

group_1.textLeft: Well... In order for Karin to come back...
We need to get her attention, right?
Mm... Maaybe...?

group_1.textRight: Karin is concerned about Alina's reformation...
And she needs Alina to reform in order for her@to fall asleep.
I thought I could get the two of them done by@just saying something nice...
But it didn't work...

group_1.textLeft: ... Well, let's rewind.
Instead of showing Karin kindness, like you've been doing,
how about we show her a new Alina?

group_1.textRight: ... What?

group_1.textLeft: Eh, um... What is it again...
Is it what they call "gap moe"...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's it!
Since Karin likes manga,
maybe a delinquent picking up an abandoned cat@in the rain...
With that kind of gap, I guarantee she would be@surprised!
Why does Alina have to stand in the rain,
and why does Alina need to pick up a cat?
Also, Alina's not that kind of bad girl in the first@place.

group_1.textLeft: That's not what I meant, it was an example...!
If Alina shows Karin a side of her that she doesn't knooww...
Well, something like that, riightt...?
Bonus points if it's veery gentle and dramaatic...

group_1.textRight: Yeah...!

group_1.textLeft: Maybe letting a spider go without killing it...?

group_1.textRight: Why a spider?
That's the story where you fail at the end, right?@It's in the textbooks.

group_1.textLeft: Well... Then, do you have pets in your home...?

group_1.textRight: Hmm...? Well, I had a dog, I heard.
Witches, also.

group_1.textLeft: Hhh...
Well, Witches aside...
If you've taken care of a dog, then you truly must@have a kind heart...
Surely! I think!
Ah, here's a cat cushion.
Please take care of it.

group_1.textRight: ... Huh? Not a dog, but a cat?
And why do I have to take care of a cushion?

group_1.textLeft: There's nothing else around...
[chara:305700:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Kyah?!@You scared me!

group_1.textRight: Geh... I thought you were gone...

group_1.textLeft: I wonder if it was trying to stay out of our business?
Please think of this ghost as a dog and take care@of it.

group_1.textRight: The ghost...?
What's the point of taking care of a ghost?

group_1.textLeft: I, aLiNA, wHAt'S tHe POinT of TaKIng cARe of A@GhoST?

group_1.textRight: Is it necessary?

group_1.textLeft: i, aLiNA, iS iT nEcEsSaRy?

group_1.textRight: You can turn into the fool girl, can't you?

group_1.textLeft: I, aLiNA, cAn trAnSForM.
I, aLiNA, trAnSForMeD.

group_1.textRight: Okay.
Then, sleep like that.
A ghost's body is still better than nothing.
It'll be less of a hassle to bring this one home.

group_1.textLeft: The Karin that we wanted to go to sleeepp,
isn't a ghost transformed into Karin...

group_1.textRight: Tch...

group_1.textLeft: Your purpose totally changed...!
